name: HITVEL
overview:
Hyderabad Information Technology Venture Enterprises Limited (HITVEL) is the Asset Management Company under the management of Srei Venture Capital Limited, the subsidiary of Srei Infrastructure Finance Limited. HITVEL is the IT & ITES investing arm of Srei Veture Capital for all of India.

HITVEL currently manages the HIVE Fund contributed by A.P. Industrial Development Corporation Limited, A.P. Industrial Infrastructure Corporation Limited, and Small Industries Development Bank of India. The HITVEL team has completed several early-stage investments in Information Technology companies in India.

Unique combination of Information Technology management and investment management expertise to create a fiduciary investor that actively monitors and manages investments.

Strong deal origination capability, supported by a top class investment committee that includes industry stalwarts, bankers, and technocrats who are actively involved with the investment process.
